Create sophisticated transitions that advance the argument

improvementTemplates.transitions: Add smooth, logical transitions between paragraphs and sections that create narrative flow
improvementTemplates.citations: Ensure minimum required citation density and proper formatting according to specified style
improvementTemplates.depth: Enhance critical analysis with more comparison, critique, evaluation, and theoretical grounding
improvementTemplates.coherence: Strengthen argument flow, logical progression, and overall narrative unity
improvementTemplates.consistency: Unify terminology, tone, conceptual usage, and formatting throughout the document
improvementTemplates.integration: Seamlessly connect sections so they build upon each other toward the overall argument
improvementTemplates.enhancement: Strengthen weak passages, clarify unclear connections, and elevate academic sophistication
improvementTemplates.quality: Apply final quality assurance including redundancy removal and scholarly tone refinement
